title: Need ALOT of answers
content:
Hey yall, I got CS in EC campus through PESSAT and our batch will prolly start at 22nd of this month. Can anyone who just completed their first year please DM me or reply to this post since I have a lot of questions and the people I know are in their 3rd or 4th year.Cheers!

Edit: Thanks guys, so many people have reached out to me and answered my questions, guess I'll be having a good time after all!

comments.body: you can DM me , i just finished 1st year .

If you don't mind, can the OP summarise and put a comment having all the Questions and Answers


Would help someone in need!
Sure! I am a little busy at the moment, by Saturday(6th) evening I shall summarize here.
There are way too many questions I asked and got answers to all of them. I can't put it all here, so please DM me if you have any questions.
